niagara.query_engine
Class QueryResult

java.lang.Object
  niagara.query_engine.QueryResult

public class QueryResult
extends java.lang.Object

QueryResult is the class at the client that interacts with the output stream of the query

Version:
1.0

private int internalGetNext(int timeout,
                            QueryResult.ResultObject resultObject)
                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException,
                            ShutdownException
This function blocks and waits for the next result from the output stream.

Parameters:
timeout - Amount of time to sleep on query output stream
resultObject - Object to be filled in with result

control flag from stream

java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread was interrupted during execution. This happens only without a timeout
